rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A small entryway that adheres to Vastu guidelines ensuring a welcoming and energy-balanced entrance.

rooms.name: Open-plan Living and Kitchen Area
rooms.description: An integrated space combining the living area and kitchen in a Scandinavian style. The kitchen is designed for efficiency with minimalistic fixtures and open shelves for storage.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Studio
rooms.description: A duplex studio apartment layout that seamlessly integrates the bedroom and living space on the same level. This room includes a multi-functional bed area and a designated corner for quiet meditation or work following Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact bathroom adhering to local norms with water-saving fixtures. Placed away from the main living area per Vastu guidelines for a balance of energy.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Aligned with Vastu principles, the main entrance is placed on the south to welcome positive energies while considering local building norms.

openings.name: Window for Living and Kitchen Area
openings.description: Strategically placed window provides natural light and ventilation, balancing energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Emergency Exit Window
openings.description: A safety opening that is in compliance with local building codes ensuring easy evacuation if needed.
